page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT IN BALDERTON
page.content: {Shops/Commercial}Public Houses 2,Fish bar 1,Vacu-lug 1,C@A 1,Hairdressers 3, Supermarkets 13,Lorry Driver 1, Bottling and Brewing Ltd 1,Silver Spoon 3,Dressmaker 1,Marks@Spencers 1, Pennywise 1, H.L.Maw 1,Candy shop 1, Garages 2, Alan Eyre 1 {Engineering/Industrial}Kentting Drilling 1,R.H.P 6,Cauton Engineering 2,Worthington Simpsons 1, ,Trenton Concrete 1,Fleur-De-Lys 1, Tailors Mechanic 1,Rocksford Construction 1, Quarry 1,Engineer 1,Hemilites 1, C.E.G.B. 4 {Catering/Food}Chocalate Factory 2, Coffee House 1,Bibies 1 {Mining}Miners 5 {Services}Schools 6,Newark Hostel 2, Hospitals 12,Social Services 5,Public Services 6, Armed Forces 3 {Unemployed}23.
